Sept. 13, 1980 D Dronfield Contest (Open Section)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Open Section) 400 Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-open-section
None
Tintagel
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £150 and trophy, 2nd £75, 3rd £40. 3 bands competed. 22nd annual contest.
June 2, 2014, 4 p.m. March 30, 2017, 8:05 a.m.
